page.title: 19Local Personality Interview
page.content: Mr Jenkins is the school caretaker. He has lived in the same house in Ewloe for 30 years. The greatest change he has seen has been the number of houses built. Carlines Park Estate & Penarlag school are built on what was farmland.Wopod Lane used to have 25 cottages but now has 2000 houses. Mr Jenkins can remember {steam trains } passing down the disused track at the side of the school playing field. Almost every home today has a washing machine.Mr Jenkins can remember his mother & wife using a{dolly tub}.The washing was put in a big tub and a { {dolly }was used to work it around, it was wrung by hand and then put out to dry. Going to the cinema was very popular, people had to queue form 1730 hrs to get in at 1830 hrs. Now television seems to be the most popular entertainment.
